Articles.Content:
I love mounting engines VTOL-style, and vertical takeoff such as Lack Luster Lab's radial engines. The only problem is that I can't hold steady flight with a VTOL, when they usually only use intake air. So i'd like a engine that you can put on the bottom of your ship, that will keep you at a constant height. It would also help if you could somehow link the engines to SAS, because RCS is too wimpy. This could help in space when going out of control, because engines are more powerful than Monopropellant. Please look into making a mod like this, or if you know of one like it, provide a link to their thread.

-Icklewiwi:cool:

Try FTT. I think it has radial VTOL engines.

By the way, is it coincidence that you have the same avatar as burnoutforzai? At first I confounded you with him.

Try FTT. I think it has radial VTOL engines.
